title: My phone was flawless until the Android 11 update .sice then charging issues and no help from google
content: Since android 11 my phone won't charge using oem chargers. I have to use the dongle provided with phone and even it is real finicky. I have to turn the cord over, hold my breath, and pray it charges. My phone is out of warranty now, but needed no repair u til they pushed the software update. Nobody has been Able to help me fix this ..what now? Is my phone junk because of this update or is google aware of this and working on a patch? I have read numerous posts about people having the same problem.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
